content: उपलः {@--1@} A stone, rock; उपलशकलेमतद्भदक गोमयानां <ls>Mu. 3. 15</ls>; कांते कथं घटितवानुपलेन चेतः <ls>Ś. Til. 3</ls>; <ls>Me. 19</ls>; <ls>Ś. 1. 14.</ls> {@--2@} A precious stone, jewel. {@--3@} Sand (<ab>Ved.</ab>). {@--4@} A cloud. --ला {@--1@} Refined sugar. {@--2@} The upper and smaller millstone which rests on the Dṛṣad. [<ab>cf.</ab> <ab>L.</ab> {%opalus%}].
